name: AWSOpsWorksSslConfigurationType
description: Describes an SSL configuration for the AWS::OpsWorks::App resource type.

properties.name: Certificate
properties.description: The contents of the certificate's domain.crt file.

properties.name: Chain
properties.description: An intermediate certificate authority key or client authentication.

properties.name: PrivateKey
properties.description: The private key; the contents of the certificate's domain.kex file.
